name: com.enso.scene-rotation-toolkit
author: David Nicklas
description:
This tool is used for rotating the scene view in different angles (90, 180, 270, 0) 
while keeping the default behaviour of Unity's orbit, pan, zoom and fps mode. 
The toolkit also supports 2D and 3D mode and has additional debug settings to 
display useful information about the camera and the state of the toolkit.
